name: WWF Wrestlemania: Steel Cage Challenge
overview: The handheld version of WWF Wrestlemania: Steel Cage Challenge is different from its console brethren. There are ten wrestlers to choose from: Bret Hart, Hulk Hogan, Irwin R. Schyster, Papa Shango, Randy Savage, Ric Flair, Shawn Michaels, Tatanka, Ted Dibiase and The Undertaker. Each wrestler has a standard set of moves consisting of punching, kicking, body slams and turnbuckle manoeuvres, as well as a finishing move for every wrestler. There are three different game modes to choose from: Single (either regular or steel-cage), Tag Team and Championship.
